      The return timelines for seller-fulfilled items sold on Amazon.in are equivalent to the return timelines mentioned above for items fulfilled by Amazon.

      If you’ve received a seller-fulfilled product in a condition that is damaged, defective or different from its description on the product detail page on Amazon.in, returns are subject to the seller's approval of the return.

      If you do not receive a response from the seller for your return request within two business days, you can submit an A-to-Z Guarantee claim. Learn more about returning seller fulfilled items.

      Note: For seller fulfilled items from Books, Movies & TV Shows categories, the sellers need to be informed of the damage/ defect within 14 days of delivery.

      For seller-fulfilled items from Fine Art category, the sellers need to be informed of the damage / defect within 10 days of delivery. These items are not eligible for self-return. The seller will arrange the return pick up for these items.

      For seller-fulfilled items from Sports collectibles and Entertainment collectibles categories, the sellers need to be informed of the damage / defect within 10 days of delivery.
      Returning Global Store Items

      The General Return Policy is applicable for all Amazon Global Store Products (“Product”). If the Product is eligible for a refund on return, you can choose to return the Product either through courier Pickup or Self-Return**

      Note: - Once the package is received at Amazon Export Sales LLC fulfillment center in the US, it takes 2 (two) business days for the refund to be processed and 2- 4 business days for the refund amount to reflect in your account. - If your return is due to an Amazon error you'll receive a full refund, else the shipping charges (onward & return) along with import fees will be deducted from your refund amount.

      Product description

      Colour:Navy Blue  |  Style name:6GB RAM  |  Pattern name:PHONE

      Honor Play boasts of dual primary camera of 16MP + 2MP and 16MP front Camera. The Smartphone is powered by Octa core HI silicon Kirin 970 Processor. Up to 6 GB of RAM will ensure phone runs smoothly even the most memory intensive applications and show no signs of lag. 64 GB of internal storage will be open for expansion up to 256 GB via a micro SD card. The phone comes with large 3750 mAh battery to support it's 16 cm (6.3 inch) screen with IPS LCD display having a resolution of 1080 x 2340 at 409 ppi.

      From the manufacturer



      Kirin 970 Processor with Dedicated AI NPU

      Honor Play is powered by the flagship Kirin 970 AI processor. The chipset houses an Octa-core CPU and a 12-core GPU. Thanks to the dedicated NPU, it can recognize 2005 images per minute while consuming less power than conventional chipsets.

      Whether you are taking a photo, watching a movie, using face unlock or even calling a friend, AI is there to assist you.

      GPU Turbo 2.0 (*Available through software update)

      GPU Turbo 2.0 accelerates gaming performance by optimizing the software and hardware resources. It offers a higher FPS stability, better graphics processing efficiency and overall lower SoC power consumption.

      AI Gaming: Stay Cool No Matter What

      Take your gaming experience to a whole new level with GPU Turbo 2.0. Its AI-enabled predictive resource allocation and intelligent scheduling efficiently improve game fluency and lower touch delays by an average of 36%.

      Read more



      Mighty Battery, Fast Charge

      Honor Play comes with a mighty 3750mAh battery with Honor Fast Charge for your fast-paced life. It doesn’t take much time to charge and lasts all day long!

      Honor FHD+ Borderless Notch Display

      Honor Play has a vivid 16.0cm FHD+ Borderless Notch Display with 19.5:9 aspect ratio. Be ready for an immersive gaming and viewing experience.

      16MP Dual Lens AI Rear Camera

      Enjoy AI photography with Honor Play’s 16+2MP Dual Lens AI Camera that automatically adjusts camera settings to give you a perfect shot every time.

      16MP Selfie Camera

      Capture stunning selfies with Honor Play’s 16MP Front Camera. It comes with different modes like 3D portrait, AR lens and Artist mode, adding to the fun quotient.

      Read more



      AI Gallery

      The enhanced smart gallery intelligently categorizes your photo albums based on people, scenes, location, object, food, etc. You can also search for photos using keywords. Photos in the smart gallery can be grouped together and used to create music videos with a pre-installed movie maker app.

      Android 9 based on EMUI 9.0 (* Available through software update)

      EMUI 9.0 features a simplified design scheme that reflects natural elements and nature’s sounds. The new vibration feedback and pure sound achieve a full range of interactive experiences from hearing to touch. It comes with lots of handy AI features that make your day-to-day life simpler. Its HI-Vision feature helps you measure your food calories and keep healthy. With Password Vault, you’ll never have to worry about forgetting another password ever again. You can manage your digital life better with the Digital Balance dashboard that learns from your behavior and usage patterns to help you keep a check on your screen-time.

      AI Shopping

      Found something interesting to buy but don’t know how and where to find it? No issues! Just point the camera at it and the AI will automatically search it online. Shopping just hit the next level!

      Read more

      praveen
      5.0 out of 5 starsGo get it you won't repent for sure
      2 November 2018
      Colour: Midnight BlackStyle: 4GB RAMPattern: PHONEVerified Purchase
      Guys, I am in a confusion for about 3 weeks on which phone to buy in the sale season. Poco F1, Honor play, Zenfone 5z and OnePlus 6. These are my shortlists and I first removed op6 because I personally didn't like oneplus because of its overrated specs and camera. SD845 is capable of AI but there is no single feature (thati know of) that used AI in oxygen OS. Then I started reading the official forums of these 3 phones. In Zenfone 5z forums, there are so many people complaining of its bugs and slow updates fixing those bugs. So I removed it next. Then I started thinking extensively on what to buy in between poco F1 and Honor play.
      I started reading Honor play forums first. In all reviews there, I see people are very satisfied with this and there are very very few complaints in the forumsR (may be a in 20). But I am inclined towards towards sd845 of poco. So, I started reading it's forums and there, I have observed so many people complaining of its build quality and display. I am still convinced some how to compromise on these two. And thought of buying it only because of sd845. I kept on reading the forums day to day. And the complaints in the poco forums kept on increasing related to its display. I have seen one complaint related to screen bleeding in poco for which the company said it is a software issue. I didn't understand how far it is true. What I wanted is not give discouraged after investing 20K of my money. So finally I took the call and ordered HONOR PLAY. I believed in the public forums but not YouTube reviews. The forums will never give wrong data as far as I believe.

      5 star for the delivery. I got the order delivered on the very next day. Thanks to Amazon. Now coming to mobile,

      Believe me guys, this is a beast. U will never feel bad for investing ur hard earned 18k on this phone.

      1) the build quality is excellent. It feels very premium in hand.
      2) camera is awesome. The pics that I take from this phone really comes very very gud. U can follow me at @praveen_buddhavarapu in Instagram to see some samples of this camera. U won't believe me if I say the night mode is also very Gud. The entire YouTube has completely gone angry with the nightmode of this phone. But believe me guys this phone's camera is no where less to any flagship camera even in night mode.
      3) the gallery app. This is the most lovely thing in this phone. I have been wondering how apple used face recognition and sorts photos based on faces, places and things. The same is also being done by Honor in this phone. The gallery app sorts and orders the pics based on the location, faces, things. And the next best thing is, it creates videos of the people like how apple does in iOS gallery app.
      4) Histen audio feature. If u wear earphones and listen to some FLAC songs with full volume with the Histen sound mode set to auto, trust me u will feel very much involved in the song and u can definitely forget about the sorroundings (use it at high volume only in ur personal place, but please keep track of us sorroundings in public places)
      4) Display is awesome. I have used a mobile with amoled display previously and I use to feel very indulged when I watch HD videos in it. The fhd display in Honor play is no where inferior to the amoled display and u can find no difference at all in between the two displays.
      5) the massive 3750 mah battery is a great thing in this phone. I don't use dual sim though my previous phones have dual sim support. I always use only one Airtel sim. With single sim, the battery use to stand for 1 and half day completely with normal usage. Always internet was on and screen on time is around 2-3hrs in an average.
      6) EMUI is perfectly blended. No bugs umi identified in my personal usage except one personal suggestion. That is they have to implement the iPhone X kind of gestures as soon as possible in this. Because when we type something, the on screen home button comes exactly down the space button and in speed typing, I sometimes use to hit on the home button instead of space. So this is the only problem is faced in this. Though Honor has confirmed the iPhone X style of gestures in Pie update, I am eagerly waiting for it.
      7) the notification led is placed at the correct position inside the earpiece. I think all the phones should place the led inside the earpiece as it won't take any extra place there. I tested it with blue, white, orange, green olkurs. But I think it will glow in some other colours as well.
      8) lastly the performance, man this is a beast. I can't say anything more. I have been using this for past one month and I never faced single hiccup with this phone. like the phone was branded, it is very smooth a gaming. I play pubg atleast 3-4 full games per day (mean 1-2 hrs daily) and I never faced any issue like lag or frame drop with this phone. The gaming suite is awesome. It won't show the annoying notifications as notification heads when we are playing any games.

      Finally I can say that this is a phone worth its price and worth my time I spent looking at reviews for this. I first feared that, after buying this phone, i might get a feeling that I didn't buy poco or Zenfone. But I never got such a feelong while using this. I am very much satisfied with this mobile and i'm happy that I didn't buy POCO. I don't know how many issues that I would face if I had bought poco.

      Hope this review helps u to decide on ur phone. Please let me know if u have any questions related to this phone. I am happy to answer.
